details.name: Mziyanda
details.bio: Hi, my name is Mziyanda Joko I am a front-end developer with 4 years of experience. I was born in a small town called Noupoort in Northen cape, I am currently living in Cape Town for +16. I am 27 years of age and I began a passion for coding during my high school phase, Since then I was sold and wanted to know more and the learning journey never stopped ever since. I am also a sports person I play Cricket on weekends when i am not coding something awesome like this pdf generator.

workesperience.address: Cape Town, Unit 1A, 31 Bell Crescent, Westlake Business Park, Westlake Cape Town
workesperience.description: Working as a front-end web developer developing responsive websites, doing updates and also website maintenance.
workesperience.tools: WordPress, Elementor editor and other plugins for different purposes like toolset for dynamic content

workesperience.description: Worked as a freelancer developer for more than two projects. I was responsible for creating front-end services for web development and hybrid app development.
workesperience.tools: HTML, Javascript, less, Flutter framework, Dart, Trello boards, Bitbucket and Jira

workesperience.description: Developing Ayaamah beauty App with Flutter and dart, I was responsible for developing new features and distributing the app for user reviews and bug fixing.
workesperience.tools: Flutter framework, Dart, Gitlab, Trello boards

workesperience.address: G12 Old Castle Brewery Complex 6 Beach Road Woodstock, 7925 South Africa
workesperience.description: Worked as an intern web developer under their big client they had at the time Old mutual. I was responsible for developing new features on the internal service they using and test for functionality and bug fixing.
workesperience.tools: HTML, Bootstrap, Javascript, less,NUNJUCKS Framework, Dust Framework and Github
